Wagner Labor ArchiveElmer Holmes Bobst Library70 Washington Square South10th FloorNew York, NY 10012(212) 998-2630tamiment.wagner@nyu.eduThis finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace 2017-07-18T20:57:57
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Joseph North Spanish Civil War Artifacts ALBA.294
0.5 Linear Feet (1 box)
1930s
Scope and Content Note
Joseph North, a Communist Party activist and journalist, visited Spain during the Civil War as a correspondent for the Daily Worker.The collection consists of a number of items that North brought back from Spain as souvenirs.
Provenance
This collection came to the Tamiment Library with the original acquisition of Abraham Lincoln Brigade collections, formerly housed at Brandeis University, in 2001. The items were donated to the Lincoln Brigade archives by Joseph North.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open to researchers. Please contact the Tamiment Library & Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives for more information and to schedule an appointment, tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu or 212-998-2630.
Conditions Governing Use
Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) held by the Abraham Lincoln Brigade Archives (ALBA), were transferred to New York University in November 2000 by the ALBA Board of Governors. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from the Tamiment Library & Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives. For more information, contact tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu or 212-998-2630. Series I: ArtifactsArtifacts (object genre)Spain -- History -- Civil War, 1936-1939.North, Joseph40 Miniatures of Barcelona (in broken box)1Hat1Scarf1Lighter (x2)1Hat1Hat (blue with red band)1Rope1Wallet1Fragment of a Label1Group Portrait1CPUSA Patch1Envelope with Message on it1Currency (Spanish and German)1Guide to Barcelona1Baggage Tickets (Ship)1Normandie Matchbook1Stationary: "Saludo a Franco: !Arriba Espana!" & Majestic Hotel Inglaterra (Barcelona)1Pamphlets: "Primero de Mayo", "Ayuda Infantil De Retaguardia"1Envelopes: Spanish Republic1Stamps/Seal1Tickets (French)1Postcards (Blank)1
